body:
Issues Fixed

Competitive Access
  • Fixed failing Accessibility Standard creation
Population Files
  • Fixed built Population File (using counties) not matching counts with using the actual counties counts

Technical Upgrades

Upgrade Pusher gem to 1.4.3 (affects confirmation pop-ups)ï»¿
Zip sample points
  • Modify zip sample point import to add a single centroid point for any zips with no sample point data in the import file
